title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8194.2 - Agricultural payment report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 8194.2 - Agricultural payment report

State Regulations

No later than 45 days following the date by which the final
assessment roll is required to be completed and filed, the assessor shall file
with ORPTS an agricultural payment report (form RP-305-pr) identifying payments
imposed on the current assessment roll for parcels converted in whole or in
part from agricultural production. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
8194.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
